SELECT b.id, b.`name` materialName, b.model, IFNULL(c.`name`, b.unit_name) unitName, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 12 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE CASE m.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END)), 0) currentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 12 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) WHEN 13 THEN (CASE m.m_type WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ELSE CASE m.type WHEN 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END)), 0), 2) currentTockMoney, IFNULL(SUM(m.oper_number * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0) returnCurrentTock, FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(m.total_price * (CASE m.sub_type WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)), 0), 2) returnCurrentTockMoney FROM erp_material_norms a LEFT JOIN erp_unit c ON a.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT q.m_unit_id, p.total_price, q.oper_number, p.sub_type, p.type, q.m_type FROM erp_depothead p, erp_depotitem q WHERE q.header_id = p.id AND q.delete_flag = '0' AND p.delete_flag = '0' AND (p.type = '2' OR (p.type = '3' AND p.sub_type IN('12', '13'))) AND p.tenant_id = #{userId} AND p.sub_type != '10' AND DATE_FORMAT(p.oper_time, '%Y-%m') = #{operTime} ) m ON m.m_unit_id = a.id, erp_material b WHERE a.meterial_id = b.id
AND b.material_name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND a.delete_flag = '0' AND b.delete_flag = '0' AND b.tenant_id = #{userId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY b.`name`
